info.title: ML Team Account Management Client
info.description: These APIs allow end users to operate on Azure Machine Learning Team Account resources. They support CRUD operations for Azure Machine Learning Team Accounts.

get.description: Lists all of the available Azure Machine Learning Team Accounts REST API operations.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The client API version.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Lists all the available machine learning team accounts under the specified subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Microsoft Azure subscription ID.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Lists all the available machine learning team accounts under the specified resource group.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Microsoft Azure subscription ID.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning team account belongs.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

put.description: Creates or updates a team account with the specified parameters.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Microsoft Azure subscription ID.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning team account belongs.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the machine learning team account.

requestBody.description: The parameters for creating or updating a machine learning team account.

200.description: The request was successful; the resource already exists and was updated.

201.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

delete.description: Deletes a machine learning team account.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Microsoft Azure subscription ID.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning team account belongs.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the machine learning team account.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

204.description: The machine learning team account does not exist in the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Lists all the available machine learning projects under the specified workspace.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Microsoft Azure subscription ID.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the machine learning team account.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: The name of the machine learning team account workspace.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning team account belongs.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

Account.description: An object that represents a machine learning team account.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of machine learning team accounts.

value.description: The list of machine learning team accounts. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of machine learning team accounts.

AccountListResult.description: The result of a request to list machine learning team accounts.

accountId.description: The immutable id associated with this team account.

creationDate.description: The creation date of the machine learning team account in ISO8601 format.

discoveryUri.description: The uri for this machine learning team account.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for this workspace. This will be the workspace name in the arm id when the workspace object gets created

keyVaultId.description: The fully qualified arm id of the user key vault.

provisioningState.description: The current deployment state of team account resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

seats.description: The no of users/seats who can access this team account. This property defines the charge on the team account.

vsoAccountId.description: The fully qualified arm id of the vso account to be used for this team account.

AccountProperties.description: The properties of a machine learning team account.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for this workspace. This will be the workspace name in the arm id when the workspace object gets created

seats.description: The no of users/seats who can access this team account. This property defines the charge on the team account.

storageAccountKey.description: The key for storage account associated with this team account

AccountPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating the properties of a machine learning team account.

tags.description: The resource tags for the machine learning team account.

AccountUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a machine learning team account.

ErrorResponse.description: The error response send when an operation fails.

operation.description: The operation that users can perform.

resource.description: The resource on which the operation is performed.

Operation.description: Azure Machine Learning team account REST API operation

value.description: List of AML team account operations supported by the AML team account resource provider.

OperationListResult.description: An array of operations supported by the resource provider.

Project.description: An object that represents a machine learning project.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of projects.

value.description: The list of projects. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of projects.

ProjectListResult.description: The result of a request to list projects.

accountId.description: The immutable id of the team account which contains this project.

creationDate.description: The creation date of the project in ISO8601 format.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for this project.

gitrepo.description: The reference to git repo for this project.

projectId.description: The immutable id of this project.

provisioningState.description: The current deployment state of project resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

workspaceId.description: The immutable id of the workspace which contains this project.

ProjectProperties.description: The properties of a machine learning project.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for this project.

gitrepo.description: The reference to git repo for this project.

ProjectPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating the properties of a project.

tags.description: The resource tags for the machine learning project.

ProjectUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a machine learning project.

location.description: The location of the resource. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

accessKey.description: The access key to the storage account.

storageAccountId.description: The fully qualified arm Id of the storage account.

StorageAccountProperties.description: The properties of a storage account for a machine learning team account.

Workspace.description: An object that represents a machine learning team account workspace.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of machine learning workspaces.

value.description: The list of machine learning team account workspaces. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of machine learning team accounts.

WorkspaceListResult.description: The result of a request to list machine learning team account workspaces.

accountId.description: The immutable id of the team account which contains this workspace.

creationDate.description: The creation date of the machine learning workspace in ISO8601 format.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for this workspace. This will be the workspace name in the arm id when the workspace object gets created

provisioningState.description: The current deployment state of team account workspace resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

workspaceId.description: The immutable id of this workspace.

WorkspaceProperties.description: The properties of a machine learning team account workspace.

WorkspacePropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating the properties of a machine learning team account workspace.

tags.description: The resource tags for the machine learning team account workspace.

WorkspaceUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a machine learning team account workspace.

AccountNameParameter.name: accountName
AccountNameParameter.description: The name of the machine learning team account.

ProjectNameParameter.name: projectName
ProjectNameParameter.description: The name of the machine learning project under a team account workspace.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning team account belongs.

WorkspaceNameParameter.name: workspaceName
WorkspaceNameParameter.description: The name of the machine learning team account workspace.
